entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this morning and early this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2.
